TripAdvisor/Viator

Guide Flavio and driver Moises were excellent

Guide Flavio and driver Moises gave my wife and me an excellent introduction to Rio. Seeing Christ the Redeemer was undoubtedly the highlight for us, as it was the last of the Seven Wonders of the Modern World that we hadn't visited. As a lifelong resident of the city and a very experienced guide, Flavio had an intimate knowledge of the sites and was friendly and very flexible. While his English is not perfect, we didn't have a problem understanding his detailed explanations. Moises did an outstanding job navigating the crazy Carnaval traffic in Rio. I also want to note that Marcelo, the owner of the tour company, was very helpful throughout the process from initial booking until tour delivery, and he took care of every detail. All in all, we would definitely recommend this tour to anyone who wants to learn about this diverse and vibrant city.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our private tours in Rio

Booking is easy! Simply browse our tours, select your preferred experience, choose your date and group size, and complete the booking form. You can also contact us directly via WhatsApp or email for personalized assistance. We'll confirm your reservation within 24 hours.

All our tours include private transportation with a professional driver, a certified English-speaking guide, entrance fees to attractions, hotel pickup and drop-off in Rio's main areas, and complimentary bottled water. Meals and gratuities are not included unless specified in the tour description.

Absolutely! That's what makes our private tours special. We can adjust the itinerary, change the pace, add or remove stops, and tailor the experience to your specific interests. Just let us know your preferences when booking, and we'll create the perfect Rio experience for you.

You can reserve your tour with zero payment upfront. Payment is only required 72 hours before your scheduled tour date. This gives you flexibility to plan your trip without immediate financial commitment. We accept credit cards through our secure payment link and PayPal.

We offer free cancellation up to 72 hours before your tour start time for a full refund. Cancellations made within 72 hours are non-refundable. Weather-related cancellations decided by our team are fully refundable or can be rescheduled at no extra cost.

Yes! All our guides are fluent in English and Portuguese (their native language). Many also speak Spanish, French, Italian, and German. When booking, let us know your language preference, and we'll match you with the best guide for your needs (subject to availability).

Yes! Complimentary hotel pickup and drop-off is included in all our private tours anywhere in Rio de Janeiro, including all neighborhoods, airports (GIG and SDU), and the cruise port. Just provide your location when booking, and we'll be there.

Rio has a tropical climate, so wear light, comfortable clothing and walking shoes. Bring sunscreen, sunglasses, and a hat for sun protection. For Christ the Redeemer, modest clothing is recommended (covering shoulders and knees). If visiting in winter (June-August), bring a light jacket as temperatures can be cooler, especially in PetrÃ³polis.
